name: Manual Rewind
description:
Created for Brackeys Jam 2020.2

Manual Rewind is a game about order. Normally when you rewind everything goes back to how it used to be. However, in Manual Rewind you are responsible for putting things back to how it used to be before the time runs out and the rewind ends.

Racing against the clock, you must put colored boxes back to their original place. Beware of spikes, they will take away your precious time.
